Studio Policies

Lesson Policies

Scheduling & Billing

All lessons are billed on a monthly basis on the 1st of the month. A subscription is available for those who prefer the convenience of auto-billing and need flexibility with scheduling.

Lessons are currently offered online only via video call.

Cancellations

Please provide at least 24 hours notice if you need to cancel or reschedule a lesson. Lessons cancelled with less than 24 hours notice may be forfeited.

Lesson Packages

Four 30-minute lessons: $140/month ($35/lesson)

Eight 30-minute lessons: $240/month ($30/lesson)

Four 60-minute lessons: $260/month ($65/lesson)

What You'll Need

A guitar, ukulele, or just your voice! A quiet space with a reliable internet connection and a device with a camera and microphone. That's it — I'll take care of the rest.
